title: sadhu sangam
sahitya:
sAdhu sangam pOdum ayyanE inda jagattinil anubhavittu shalittEn



anupallavi



shUdum vAdum vEdanai sheyyum shUzcciyinrit-tUya nalla



caraNam



satikAra kumbalinri adhikAra Dambaminri japa tapa shubha gItamuDanE

sadA dhyAna pUjai seydu

ati manidarAi padiyarivuDan hanumatODi pAdi Adum
